anime.title: Naruto
anime.synopsis: Follows the story of Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja who seeks recognition and dreams of becoming the Hokage.

anime.title: Dragon Ball Z
anime.synopsis: Goku, the warrior of the Saiyan race, protects Earth from various threats and challenges.

anime.title: One Piece
anime.synopsis: A group of pirates led by Monkey D. Luffy journey to find the ultimate treasure known as the 'One Piece'.

anime.title: Attack on Titan
anime.synopsis: In a world under constant threat from Titans, humanity fights for survival within enormous walled cities.

anime.title: My Hero Academia
anime.synopsis: In a world where nearly everyone possesses superpowers, young heroes are trained to fight against villains.

anime.title: Death Note
anime.synopsis: A high-school student discovers a supernatural notebook that allows him to kill anyone whose name he writes.

anime.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
anime.synopsis: Two brothers use alchemy to search for the Philosopher's Stone in order to restore their bodies after a failed experiment.

anime.title: Sword Art Online
anime.synopsis: Players of a virtual reality game find themselves trapped, with death in the game meaning death in real life.

anime.title: Neon Genesis Evangelion
anime.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, young pilots fight against mysterious beings known as Angels.

anime.title: Cowboy Bebop
anime.synopsis: A group of bounty hunters travel through space, facing various challenges and moral dilemmas.

anime.title: Pokémon
anime.synopsis: Ash Ketchum sets out on a journey to become the Pokémon Master.

anime.title: Bleach
anime.synopsis: A teenager gains the abilities of a Soul Reaper and must protect the living from dark spirits.

anime.title: Fairy Tail
anime.synopsis: Young wizards form a guild and set out on adventures to gain recognition and fulfill missions.

anime.title: One Punch Man
anime.synopsis: A superhero becomes so strong that he can defeat any opponent with a single punch, leading to an existential crisis.

anime.title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
anime.synopsis: A young boy fights demons after his family is slaughtered and his sister is turned into a demon.

anime.title: Hunter x Hunter
anime.synopsis: A young boy aspires to become a Hunter and find his missing father, embarking on a life of adventure and danger.

anime.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
anime.synopsis: The Joestar family confronts various supernatural challenges across generations.

anime.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
anime.synopsis: A boy becomes involved in battles that are fought through a card game, leading to real-world consequences.

anime.title: Steins;Gate
anime.synopsis: A group of friends discover they can send messages to the past, leading to unexpected and tragic consequences.

anime.title: Tokyo Ghoul
anime.synopsis: A college student becomes a half-ghoul after a chance encounter, forcing him to adapt to a darker world.

anime.title: Code Geass
anime.synopsis: In an alternate future, a young man gains the power of Geass and aims to overthrow the Holy Britannian Empire.

anime.title: Your Lie in April
anime.synopsis: A piano prodigy unable to hear music after his mother's death finds new meaning in his life through a fateful encounter.

anime.title: Clannad
anime.synopsis: A high school delinquent forms friendships and relationships that change his cynical view on life.

anime.title: Gintama
anime.synopsis: Set in an alternate-history Edo period, the series focuses on an eccentric samurai and his friends.

anime.title: Inuyasha
anime.synopsis: A modern-day girl travels to a mystical world and meets a half-demon with whom she shares adventures.

anime.title: Gundam Wing
anime.synopsis: In a future where Earth and space colonies are at war, young pilots and their Gundam units fight for peace.

anime.title: Nana
anime.synopsis: Two women with the same name but different backgrounds find their lives intertwined as they strive for their dreams.

anime.title: Durarara!!
anime.synopsis: In Tokyo's Ikebukuro district, various characters, including gangsters and mythical beings, cross paths.

anime.title: Black Clover
anime.synopsis: In a world where magic reigns, a young boy born without magical power aims to become the Wizard King.

anime.title: Violet Evergarden
anime.synopsis: A former soldier becomes an 'Auto Memory Doll' and learns about emotions while helping others express their feelings.

anime.title: Samurai Champloo
anime.synopsis: A young woman roams Edo-era Japan with two samurai who couldn't be more different from each other.

anime.title: Elfen Lied
anime.synopsis: A young mutant girl escapes from a lab and finds shelter with a boy, but her past chases her.

anime.title: Trigun
anime.synopsis: A gunslinger wanders a desert world, followed by two insurance agents due to the trouble that seems to follow him.

anime.title: Paranoia Agent
anime.synopsis: A town is gripped by paranoia and fear when mysterious assaults start occurring.

anime.title: Hellsing
anime.synopsis: An organization dedicated to hunting down supernatural threats faces a Nazi resurgence.

anime.title: Fruits Basket
anime.synopsis: A young girl discovers that members of a family are cursed to turn into animals of the Chinese Zodiac.

anime.title: Rurouni Kenshin
anime.synopsis: A wandering samurai who has vowed never to kill again protects the innocent.

anime.title: FLCL
anime.synopsis: A young boy's life is turned upside down when a mysterious woman on a Vespa runs him over and a horn grows from his forehead.
anime.genre: Science Fiction, Comedy, Coming of Age

anime.title: Bakuman
anime.synopsis: Two high school students aim to become successful manga artists.

anime.title: Monster
anime.synopsis: A neurosurgeon's life spirals out of control when he's framed for a series of murders.

anime.title: Serial Experiments Lain
anime.synopsis: A teenage girl becomes involved with a mysterious virtual realm.

anime.title: Madoka Magica
anime.synopsis: A group of girls make contracts to become magical girls, only to discover the dark truth behind their powers.

anime.title: Nichijou
anime.synopsis: Follows the everyday lives of three high school girls and their bizarre experiences.

anime.title: Spice and Wolf
anime.synopsis: A merchant and a wolf deity travel together in a medieval setting.

anime.title: Toradora!
anime.synopsis: Two high school students form a reluctant alliance to help each other with their respective crushes.

anime.title: Erased
anime.synopsis: A man with the ability to time-travel tries to solve a murder case to prevent a tragedy in his past.

anime.title: Black Lagoon
anime.synopsis: A Japanese salaryman joins a group of mercenaries after being kidnapped and left for dead.

anime.title: K-On!
anime.synopsis: High school girls form a band and navigate the joys and challenges of friendship and music.

anime.title: Gurren Lagann
anime.synopsis: Humanity fights to reclaim the Earth's surface, led by two brothers and their oversized mecha.

anime.title: Blue Exorcist
anime.synopsis: The son of Satan decides to become an exorcist, battling demons and his own origin.

anime.title: Psycho-Pass
anime.synopsis: In a future where psychological states are monitored, an officer questions the system while hunting a rogue criminal.

anime.title: Fate/Zero
anime.synopsis: Seven mages and their summoned heroes fight for the Holy Grail, a relic that can grant any wish.

anime.title: Made in Abyss
anime.synopsis: A young girl and her robot friend descend into the Abyss, a mysterious and dangerous chasm, in search of her mother.

anime.title: Haikyuu!!
anime.synopsis: A young volleyball player with a lot of passion but little height aims to become the best with his team.

anime.title: KonoSuba
anime.synopsis: After dying in a traffic accident, a young man is reborn in a fantasy world and forms a dysfunctional adventuring team.

anime.title: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, As I Expected
anime.synopsis: A cynical high school student is forced to join a club dedicated to helping others, leading to unexpected friendships.

anime.title: Anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day
anime.synopsis: A group of childhood friends reunite to help the ghost of a friend find peace.

anime.title: Mob Psycho 100
anime.synopsis: A young boy with immense psychic powers struggles to live a normal life and control his abilities.

anime.title: Death Parade
anime.synopsis: People who die at the same time are sent to bars run by arbiters, where they play games to decide their fates.

anime.title: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya
anime.synopsis: A high school student discovers his classmate is searching for supernatural phenomena and gets caught up in her eccentric activities.

anime.title: Baccano!
anime.synopsis: Multiple stories interweave in Prohibition-era America, involving alchemists, gangsters, and immortals.

anime.title: Golden Time
anime.synopsis: A law student with amnesia falls in love and navigates the complexities of relationships and identity.

anime.title: Kino's Journey
anime.synopsis: Kino and her talking motorbike, Hermes, travel through various countries with unique customs and philosophies.

anime.title: Monogatari Series
anime.synopsis: A young man encounters several girls affected by oddities and attempts to help them.

anime.title: Beelzebub
anime.synopsis: A delinquent high school student finds himself caring for the son of the Demon Lord.

anime.title: Soul Eater
anime.synopsis: Students at a school for weapon wielders and living weapons hunt evil souls to protect the world.

anime.title: Log Horizon
anime.synopsis: Players of a popular MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game world and must adapt to their new reality.

anime.title: D.Gray-man
anime.synopsis: A young exorcist battles Akuma, mechanical weapons created by the Millennium Earl to help him destroy humanity.

anime.title: Noragami
anime.synopsis: A minor god without a shrine teams up with a human girl to gain followers and become more powerful.

anime.title: High School of the Dead
anime.synopsis: A group of high school students must survive a zombie apocalypse while searching for their loved ones.

anime.title: Ouran High School Host Club
anime.synopsis: A scholarship student ends up working for an all-male host club at her elite academy to pay off a debt.

anime.title: Magi: The Labyrinth of Magic
anime.synopsis: A boy sets out on a journey to explore mysterious dungeons, which are said to contain priceless treasures.

anime.title: Berserk
anime.synopsis: A lone mercenary finds himself embroiled in a battle against demonic forces.

anime.title: Angel Beats!
anime.synopsis: A group of dead students form a resistance group to fight an enigmatic girl who seems to have control over the afterlife.

anime.title: The Promised Neverland
anime.synopsis: Children at a seemingly idyllic orphanage discover its dark secret and plan an escape.

anime.title: Shinsekai Yori
anime.synopsis: In a future society with telekinetic abilities, a group of friends uncovers dark secrets about their world.

anime.title: Nana
anime.synopsis: Two young women with the same name but different aspirations cross paths in Tokyo.

anime.title: Great Teacher Onizuka
anime.synopsis: A former gang member becomes a high school teacher and imparts life lessons.

anime.title: Initial D
anime.synopsis: A young tofu delivery driver discovers his exceptional drifting skills and enters the world of underground racing.

anime.title: Gankutsuou: The Count of Monte Cristo
anime.synopsis: A futuristic retelling of the classic novel, focusing on themes of revenge and fate.

anime.title: Oreimo
anime.synopsis: A brother finds out that his overachieving sister is secretly an otaku obsessed with adult video games.

anime.title: Higurashi When They Cry
anime.synopsis: Residents of a rural village are entangled in a cycle of murders and supernatural events.

anime.title: 91 Days
anime.synopsis: In the Prohibition era, a man seeks to avenge the death of his family by infiltrating a crime family.

anime.title: K
anime.synopsis: Various clans vie for power in a modern, alternate-reality Japan, guided by a mysterious, super-powered 'king.'

anime.title: My Youth Romantic Comedy Is Wrong, As I Expected
anime.synopsis: A cynical high school student is forced to join a club dedicated to solving students' problems.

anime.title: Kaiji: Ultimate Survivor
anime.synopsis: A man finds himself embroiled in high-stakes games where the cost of losing is more than just money.

anime.title: Barakamon
anime.synopsis: A young calligrapher moves to a remote island to rediscover his artistic inspiration.

anime.title: Hyouka
anime.synopsis: A high school student with a knack for solving mysteries joins the school's Classic Lit Club.

anime.title: Chihayafuru
anime.synopsis: A high school girl aims to become the world's greatest karuta player.

anime.title: Shirobako
anime.synopsis: Five friends navigate the challenging world of anime production.

anime.title: Ping Pong: The Animation
anime.synopsis: Two friends find their friendship and skills tested in the competitive world of table tennis.

anime.title: Kaguya-sama: Love is War
anime.synopsis: Two student council members engage in elaborate schemes to get the other to confess their love.

anime.title: Planetes
anime.synopsis: Space debris collectors face existential dilemmas in a world increasingly reliant on space technology.

anime.title: A Silent Voice
anime.synopsis: A young man seeks redemption by befriending a deaf girl he bullied in elementary school.

anime.title: Kuroko no Basket
anime.synopsis: A high school basketball team aims for the national championship.

anime.title: Kanon
anime.synopsis: A young man returns to a town and uncovers the mysteries behind his forgotten past.

anime.title: Overlord
anime.synopsis: A player finds himself stuck in a virtual MMORPG and decides to conquer the game world.

anime.title: Slam Dunk
anime.synopsis: A high school basketball team works together to reach the national championships.

anime.title: Ergo Proxy
anime.synopsis: A woman investigates a series of murders and uncovers a conspiracy.

anime.title: Akame ga Kill!
anime.synopsis: A young swordsman joins a group of assassins to take down a corrupt empire.
